tic_tac_toe.title: Your Turn: Phonics
tic_tac_toe.directions: Match each word to the sentence it completes. If you are correct, place your X on the board by clicking a square. Three spaces in a row wins.

item.text: A(n) [enabler] supports another person in his bad habits.
The frown on her face revealed her [displeasure].
Keri wore a(n) [outlandish]costume to the party.
Jon’s [bewilderment] showed on his face.
Sophia was a(n) [graceful] dancer.
The cookies were distributed [evenly].
The [unsuccessful] attempt to reach the peak was disappointing.
With our [encouragement], Mom will finish the race.
Trayvon’s generosity and [unselfishness] were widely admired.
I’m sure he didn’t intend to be [disrespectful].
[Enlistment] of new safety captains is now in progress.
The [endlessness] of the universe is a topic for physics.
After my nap, I felt [unsteady] on my feet.
Some people don’t like the [discomfort] of sleeping outside in a tent.
Ivan is famous for his [speediness] on the field.
The children’s playground is completely [enclosed].
Everyone admires the [youthfulness] of Grandpa Joe.
Though they looked [distasteful], the vegetables were delicious!
The [unevenness] of the paved road makes it difficult for bike riding.
After working all day, I did not appreciate her [thanklessness].
Which [enrichment] classes do you plan to take?
I [disentangled] the two chains so that I could wear my necklace.
[Disorderly] conduct is unsafe near the pool.
Abby’s sense of [empowerment] increased with each success.
